sourcesContent:
import { Component, EventEmitter, Input, Output } from '@angular/core'; import { Employee } from '../../Employee'; @Component({ selector: 'app-employee-list', templateUrl: './employee-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./employee-list.component.css'] }) export class EmployeeListComponent { @Input() listprt:Employee |any @Output() item=new EventEmitter() emp?:Employee srcdata:Employee[]=[] src?:string |any edu?:string |any searchitem(){ this.srcdata= this.listprt.filter( (v:any)=> v.empnm.indexOf(this.src) !==-1 ) } fetchitem(e:any) { this.item.emit(e); } func(e:any) { console.log(e); } getColor(empid:any){ if(empid<=100) return "dark blue" else return "green" } }
Employee Id Employee Name Gender Education Company Name Experience Salary Action
{{a.empid}} {{a.empnm | uppercase}} {{a.gen}} {{a.edu}} {{a.compnm | uppercase}} {{a.exp}} {{a.sal | currency:"INR"}} delete edit
{{a.empid}} {{a.empnm}} {{a.gen}} {{a.edu}} {{a.compnm}} {{a.exp}} {{a.sal | currency : "INR"}}
